column4: anyone got md5sums for the hardy DVD iso's? I can't reach cdimage.ubuntu.com at the moment and I want to check if my torrented files are correct
When go to burn your DVD image - I believe your burner program will do a checksum before it burns - if that's off it will not burn.
I can generate the md5sum of the isos I have here.. I want to know what the correct ones should be so I know my files are complete
